content.question: Which of the following statements most accurately describes the beat and subdivisions of the beat in the accompanying piano part?

choices.label: Three beats per measure with a simple subdivision of the beat
Three beats per measure with a compound subdivision of the beat
Four beats per measure with a simple subdivision of the beat
Four beats per measure with a compound subdivision of the beat

content.answer: Four beats per measure with a compound subdivision of the beat

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in notated music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
